unnormalised: As per the CBSE guidelines released on 25/07/2024, the Class 10 board exams for the academic year 2024-25 will likely be held in March '25. Students appearing should focus on the NCERT syllabus, solve previous year's papers (PYQs), and aim for at least 90% to secure admission in top colleges like DPS and Kendriya Vidyalaya. Don't forget to thoroughly revise all chapters! Good luck to all the students.
normalised: As per the C-B-S-E guidelines released on twenty fifth july two thousand and twenty four, the Class ten board exams for the academic year two thousand and twenty four to twenty five will likely be held in March twenty five. Students appearing should focus on the N-C-E-R-T syllabus, solve previous year's papers (P-Y-Qs), and aim for at least ninety percent to secure admission in top colleges like D-P-S and Kendriya Vidyalaya. Don't forget to thoroughly revise all chapters! Good luck to all the students.
